permissions: Authorization is enforced by membership-type policies; BrokerMembershipPolicy aliases destroy? to create?.
side_effects: Deletes the membership record; nullifies associated default contacts; destroys invalid notification subscriptions; deactivates related laborers; nullifies invalid objective and key result ownership; notifies audit log; clears the user memberships cache and touches the user record.
validation_notes: Validation: Requires a membership ID argument; --confirm is required.
